      • getRandom

        public static Random getRandom()
        Gets the shared Random objects.

      • pickRandom

        public static <T> T pickRandom(List<T> from)
        Picks a random object in the list.

      • callEvent

        public static void callEvent(Event event)
        Call an event.

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(String message)
        Broadcast the message to all players. Do not send it to Console contrary to Bukkit.broadcastMessage(String)

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(String permission,
             String message)
        Broadcast the message to all players who have the given permission. Do not send it to Console contrary to Bukkit.broadcastMessage(String)

      • matchMaterial

        public static Material matchMaterial(String pattern)
        Match a material. Wraps Material.matchMaterial(String) and add an support for `dye`.

      • parseDataFor

        public static Short parseDataFor(Material material,
                 String token)
        Parse the data for the given material and the given token. This supports things such as colors name for wools, etc..

      • parseColorsMarkup

        public static String parseColorsMarkup(String message)
        Replaces all {ColorName} in the string by the corresponding color code.

      • parseLocale

        public static Locale parseLocale(String localeStr)
        Parse a locale identifier into a Locale. Returns the system default Locale if the string is invalid.

      • parseLocale

        public static Locale parseLocale(String localeStr,
                 String delimiter)
        Parse a locale identifier into a Locale using the given delimiter. Returns the system default Locale if the string is invalid.
